text.0: served with oblations firstborn mountainrender aṅgiras son bṛhaspati the holy.
text.1: with twicefirm path dwelling in light our father roars loudly as a bull to earth and heaven.
text.2: bṛhaspati who made for such a people wide room and verge when gods were invocated.
text.3: slaying his enemies breaks down their castles quelling his foes and conquering those who hate him.
text.4: bṛhaspati in war hath won rich treasures hath won this god the great stalls filled with cattle.
text.5: striving to win waters and light resistless bṛhaspati with lightning smites the foeman.
